trans-unit.source: Represents the data in a SOAP request sent or a SOAP response received by an XML Web service client at a specific <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta i dati in una richiesta SOAP inviata o una risposta SOAP ricevuta da un client del servizio Web XML in uno specifico <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""> </xref> campo di intestazione di richiesta HTTP per la richiesta o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The Action property is available in any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di azione è disponibile in qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""> </xref> campo di intestazione di richiesta HTTP per la richiesta o risposta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the client proxy class, which derives from <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza della classe proxy client, che deriva da <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Client property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Client accessibili durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the client proxy class.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza della classe proxy client.

trans-unit.source: Gets a representation of the method prototype of the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una rappresentazione del prototipo di metodo del metodo del servizio Web XML a cui è destinata la richiesta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Although the MethodInfo property can be accessed during any stage, the method information is only available during <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene in qualsiasi fase, è possibile accedere alla proprietà MethodInfo, le informazioni sul metodo è disponibile solo durante <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> representing the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref> che rappresenta il metodo di servizio Web XML a cui è destinata la richiesta SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the client waits for the server to finish processing an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il client attende per il server per completare l'elaborazione di un metodo di servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> applied to an XML Web service method or XML Web service client can specify whether the XML Web service method is one way by setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> property of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>applicato a un metodo del servizio Web XML o XML Web client del servizio possa specificare se il metodo di servizio Web XML è un modo impostando il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>proprietà dell'attributo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The OneWay property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà OneWay accessibili durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client does not wait for the server to completely process a method.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il client non attende che il server di elaborazione di un metodo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la versione del protocollo SOAP utilizzata per comunicare con il servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: When an XML Web service supports SOAP version 1.1,.NET Framework clients communicate with an XML Web service in that version by default.
trans-unit.target: Quando un servizio Web XML supporta SOAP versione 1.1, i client di .NET Framework comunicano con un servizio Web XML in tale versione per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: For details on how to change the version of the SOAP protocol, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come modificare la versione del protocollo SOAP, vedere il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'URL del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The Url property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Url accessibili durante qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: L'URL del servizio Web XML.
